sourceMeaningMnemonic: Move <radical>thread</radical> in the right <radical>direction</radical> and you'll end up <kanji>spinning</kanji> it into yarn. Then you can spin that yarn into a sweater or a scarf with your favorite half tofu half fugu mascot on it!
meaningInfo: Imagine spinning thread into whatever your imagination wants.
readingMnemonic: While you're <kanji>spinning</kanji> you realize that you've always wanted to make your own <reading>bow</reading>ling (<ja>ぼう</ja>) ball. And bowling ball cover. And bowling ball shoes.
readingInfo: Picture all of these thread-made bowling items. You're a really big bowling fan, huh?
